metadata.title: CVE-2020-27767 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in ImageMagick in MagickCore/quantum.h. An attacker whosubmits a crafted file that is processed by ImageMagick could triggerundefined behavior in the form of values outside the range of types `float`and `unsigned char`. This would most likely lead to an impact toapplication availability, but could potentially cause other problemsrelated to undefined behavior. This flaw affects ImageMagick versions priorto 7.0.9-0.

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
